rules_text:
Menace, lifelink
Whenever Harry deals combat damage to a player, that player takes a burden.
[i]Otherworld[/i] – At the beginning of your upkeep, if an opponent has been burdened three or more times, you may transform Harry.
rules_text2: {2}{B}, Exile a creature card from a graveyard: Put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control with a finality counter on it. Activate only as a sorcery and only once each turn.
